Header: SLFP interviews held to select candidates for August elections
Content: Interviews, to select candidates to contest under the Sri Lanka Freedom Party ticket at the August parliamentary elections, were held today .The interviews are taking place at the SLFP Headquarters located down Darley Road, Colombo. Provincial Councillors, Pradeshiya Sabha Members and a number of new faces were called in for Wednesday’s interviews. Mayor of Galle,Methsiri De Silva stated that, to win the election, the party must move forward without causing harm to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party under a good political leadership and that the decision taken to provide nominations for such candidates is a good one. SLFP Gampaha District Organiser, R. Waragoda added that this party cannot be destroyed, and that the persons and leaders who broke away in the past have returned to the party after falling on their knees and that the nation and the party have to work with responsibility to protect the party. The interviews were conducted by SLFP seniors such as Dr. Sarath Amunugama, A.H.M.Fowzie, Ranjith Siyambalapitiya, Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena and Piyasena Gamage.
